And as soon as the Chaochitan energy was released in the explosion it 
halted at Hellpeons feet. The energy barrette having been blown apart 
in the blast. As soon as the explosion dissapears Hellpeon just 
stands there as a smile traces his face.

Hellpeon: "You are a fool... you think this training thing was for me 
to fight you? No my friend it was to weaken you. Two of your weapon 
things are gone. Only one left. You are no longer a threat to me. But 
now I think I will make you fully realize this."

Hellpeon smirked as his wings spread, and as they spread seemingly 
three others follow. A moment later he darted off to the side at high 
speeds two more things that look exactly like him following. In a 
brief moment he springs into the air as the other two spring forward 
and glow before each turns into a ball of intense Chaochitan Energy 
directed to slam into Ultimo, at the same time two eyes seemingly 
appear within Hellpeons shoulders before each fires a beam of 
Chaochitan energy at Ultimo.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Ultimo smiled as well.  "Once again, you have shown your fatal 
> flaw, you think I give a damn!" Ultimo said as he unattached the 
> shield.  "Do you feel anything Guarda?"
> 
> "Umm yea, my insides are expanding, the energy within me is 
> uncontrollable, it's going to blow, help me Campeon."  the shield 
> cried out.
> 
> "Hmm, all right, for once I will help you.  I will give you a quick 
> death."  With that Ultimo threw the shield at amazing speed at 
> Hellpeon.  The shield zipped through the air and a few feet infront 
of 
> Hellpeon it exploded as a energy barrette ripped through it.  The 
> blast spread out and was immense.
